author: Kid_Paddle
title: Life Guard Tower
review:
This set is not for sale and it is NOT from Mc Donalds.
Magic Box is a menu in a fast food restaurant named Quick (in Belgium) and this LEGO set can only be obtained in Belgium when you go to Quick and buy a Magic Box.

It contains very nice parts and is a great addition to every Lego City of 2007!

author: azoxystrobin
title: LEGO fast food baywatch
review:
I got this set from the Quick fast food restaurant in France, in fact I got all four of them, I can't believe I ate so many burgers to get these :O

Anyway, a nice little set, with plenty of useful bits, woo, a dark red dish :) a girl minifig is a nice change and the jet ski is nicely made also.

a precusor for the new 2008 rescue team sets maybe?

Anyway, this set made eating all those burgers worth it, maybe i should have got some more ? :)

author: hustla187
title: Best Promo Set Ever
review: Most promo are kind of lame, but this one isn't and takes promo sets to a whole new level. I like the jet ski and the lifeguard tower. It is good for a Lego beach. The lifeguard minifigure is cool too. This is the best promo set by far!

author: dv54321
title: Good
review:
Box/Instructions

it comes in a polybag, and the instructions are clear

Parts

it is a quick, easy build.

Minifigures

nice detail.

The build

it was quick and easy. 

The completed model

it was fun to play with and it looked nice.

Overall opinion

i think that this is a pretty good set, for people that want to build something, but dont have enough time.
